DockerServiceNotRunning.error_summary: Docker service is not running on test run host.
DockerServiceNotRunning.error_user_message: Please start the docker service to run tests.

ImagePullError.error_summary: Can not pull image from registry.
ImagePullError.error_user_message: Please check if URL endpoints for docker-registry-image is correct.

TarfileDownloadError.error_summary: Can not download the tar/gz file image.
TarfileDownloadError.error_user_message: Can not download the tar/gz file image, recheck path of file on FTP server.

ImageLoadErrorFromTarfile.error_summary: Can not load image from tarfile.
ImageLoadErrorFromTarfile.error_user_message: Can not load image from tar/gz file. Tar/gz file may be invalid/corrupt. Please check if image is archived properly.

CannotCreateContainer.error_user_message: Can not create container from image under test. Check permissions.

ImageNotPresent.error_summary: Image under test is not present. Image:
ImageNotPresent.error_user_message: Image under test is not present.

TarImageIOError.error_summary: Can not access tar/gz file image. File:
TarImageIOError.error_user_message: Can not access tar/gz file image. Check path and permissions of file.

InvalidTarFileImage.error_summary: Can not find repository name in tar/gz file.
InvalidTarFileImage.error_user_message: Can not find repository name in tar/gz file. Kindly check if image has a name before archiving it. Image should always have a name. Resubmit the image by giving it a proper name.

OutputDirectoryDoesNotExist.error_summary: Output directory specified in command line does not exist.
OutputDirectoryDoesNotExist.error_user_message: Output directory specified in command line does not exist.
